overview: No Journey’s End weaves together the artist’s own words and music, with an audio soundtrack that includes excerpts from the songs “The Mystic’s Dream”, “Bonny Portmore”, “Prospero’s Speech”, “Huron ‘Beltane’ Fire Dance” and “Tango To Evora”. This DVD also features a live concert performance of “The Lady Of Shalott” and performances of “Santiago” and “The Dark Night Of The Soul”.
title: Loreena McKennitt: No Journey's End
